Hi, I'm Koichi.

I'm a Cognitive Science student with a strong interest in BCI, HCI, and Machine Learning. Originally from Japan, I'm currently an international student at De Anza College, CA. Follow me on Twitter and learn more about me.

To De Anza Students

I'm leading two clubs at De Anza College. If you're interested, feel free to join us. Open to De Anza students only.

  • DAHCI
    (De Anza Human-Computer Interaction) We explore Human-Computer Interaction within Cognitive Science, utilizing techniques like heart rate monitoring, eye tracking, and EEG. We're currently a club on trial.
  • MLCL
    (Machine Learning for College Life) Our goal is to bridge the gap between Machine Learning and everyday college life, making technology more accessible and beneficial to students. Our club application is currently pending.
